name: Twitter API recent tweets custom query
description: Uses the twitter API to query recent tweets based off of key words/phrases, and other controls.

name: Google News Headlines
description: Retrieves all headlines from the Google News RSS feed
query:
api get https://news.google.com/rss?hl=en-US&gl=US&ceid=US:en
|| normalize rss.channel
|| normalize item
|| html description.0 --selector "LI"
|| rename _html.innerText description
|| parseTimestamp pubDate.0
|| rename _timestamp.epoch epoch
|| table description epoch
|| filter "(description != 'View Full Coverage on Google News')"
